DIF.Entry_Title: Sea Ice Concentrations from Nimbus-7 SMMR and DMSP SSM/I-SSMIS Passive Microwave Data

Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Creator: Cavalieri, D. J., C. L. Parkinson, P. Gloersen, and H. J. Zwally.
Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Title: Sea Ice Concentrations from Nimbus-7 SMMR and DMSP SSM/I-SSMIS Passive Microwave Data
Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Publisher: NASA NSIDC DAAC: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center

Contact_Address.Address: National Snow and Ice Data Center
National Snow and Ice Data Center

Project.Long_Name: Earth Observing System Data Information System

DIF.Quality: NSIDC staff visually checks the entire set of data files and selected graphics files. This includes checks for proper file structure, comparisons to existing SMMR-, SSM/I-, and SSMIS-derived sea ice concentration grids, masks, and information files, and examination of data quality. Some weather-related effects and land contamination are still present. The amount and spatial distribution of those remaining weather effects varies with season. Also, occasional bad scan lines still appear in the data. Based on NSIDC analyses (see NSIDC Special Report 5: An Intercomparison of DMSP F11- and F13-derived Sea Ice Products for summaries of differences among the SSM/I sensors), some sensor-to-sensor differences are likely to remain in these data, particularly for marginal ice zones. During May 1986, residual weather effects and processing errors result in large bands of very low ice concentrations over the open ocean in the Weddell, Bellingshausen, and Amundsen seas in the Southern Hemisphere. Although the magnitude of these

Summary.Abstract: This data set is generated from brightness temperature data and is designed to provide a consistent time series of sea ice concentrations spanning the coverage of several passive microwave instruments.The data are provided in the polar stereographic projection at a grid cell size of 25 x 25 km.

Related_URL.Description: Sea Ice Remote Sensing at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center
Near-Real-Time DMSP SSM/I-SSMIS Daily Polar Gridded Sea Ice Concentrations

DIF.DIF_Revision_History: 2015-07-28, Gloria Hicks, Added keyword for Drupal migration. 2012-10-02, Updated spatial coverage 2012-10-02, Fixed citation. 2013-05-30, Karla LeFevre, Removed information regarding preliminary data because NRT product (NSIDC-0081) is closely matched to this data set. 2013-06-14, Karla LeFevre, Updated temporal coverage to 2012. 2013-02-13, Karla LeFevre, Updated temporal coverage through 12-31-2011. 2013-08-29, Gloria Hicks, changed temp resolution from 2 days to 1 day for avg. sea ice concentration and sea ice concentration 25 km 2014-02-11, Karla LeFevre, Like NSIDC-0001, removed Temporal Coverage End Date to accurately reflect that data processing is ongoing. 2014-06-09, Ann Windnagel, Minor update to temporal coverage, no QC needed. 1996-01-01, Transferred from mddb dataset_citation.release_date 2006-08-03, lfrench, Ken changed all these to use new dynamic forms (media order or optional registration). 2003-12-18, yohe, 2004-05-10, yohe, 2004-11-30, yohe, 2004-11-30, yohe, 2005-01-07, yohe, 2005-03-03, Gloria Hicks, 2005-03-03, Gloria Hicks, 2006-01-20, lfrench, Updated date in citation (DIFs Plus page). Send to GCMD. 2006-02-02, lfrench, Updated processing date in summary and end date in temporal coverage field. Send to GCMD. 2006-02-02, lfrench, Updated date in summary, temporal coverage. Send to GCMD. 2006-10-25, lfrench, Major updates. New FTP site. New file names. New preliminary data, etc. 2006-10-31, lfrench, Updated summary with new citation info. 2008-10-14, Deann Miller, Updated citation on the DIFS Plus page. Does not need to go to the GCMD. 2009-12-09, Deann Miller, Added note to catalog pg RE: availability of F-17 data. 2010-06-02, Deann Miller, Added SSI notice regarding RSS F17 unavailability. 2010-11-17, Deann Miller, Added a link to Polaris on the catalog page. 2010-11-18, Deann Miller, Changed text to Polaris link. 2010-12-16, Deann Miller, updated summary 2011-01-06, Deann Miller, Updated Access Polaris Data link so that it now goes directly to that data set in Polaris instead of just going to the main Web page of Polaris. 2011-02-09, Deann Miller, fixed link 2011-02-09, Deann Miller, fixed link 2011-04-07, Deann Miller, Updated Data Access link, citation text (Publishing/DIFS Plus sections), and references (Data set info section). 2011-08-23, Deann Miller, Updated temporal coverage. 2011-10-07, Deann Miller, Updated all sections to include information regarding new F17 SSMIS data. 2011-10-10, Deann Miller, Updated all sections to include information regarding new F17 SSMIS data. 2012-07-09, Deann Miller, corrected dist. file size 2012-08-21, Deann Miller, deleted the 2006 "preliminary" data citation with Meier as author. (Publisher Information section) 2012-08-22, Deann Miller, correcting version in data set citation - removed "Final data" from version field. 2012-10-02, 2015-03-10, Ann Windnagel, Small change to temporal coverage. No QC needed. 2015-03-17, Ann Windnagel, Small change to data center. No QC needed. 2015-11-11, Deann Miller, Data were reprocessed from 1978 to 2014, and additional QC of the data set was done to remove additional spurious ice. Date set went to a Version 1.1. 2015-11-17, Deann Miller, Removed Version 1.1 since this data is bad and taking the data set out of sleep mode. 2015-11-17, Deann Miller, Changed the temporal coverage back to the date for Version 1. 2015-11-17, Deann Miller, Added HTTPs link 2015-12-11, Michon Scott, Cleanup for Polar Stereo Drupal migration. 2015-12-18, Deann Miller, New Version 1.1 data set published. 2016-02-09, Michon Scott, Keyword cleanup for Drupal migration. 2016-05-24, Deann Miller, Updated temporal coverage.
